Author: zumlepurzo
Text: I think he was only trying to help by telling her shes fine as she is, and doesn't need to stress about losing weight. He just isn't aware what "medium" means in EDlogic. And over all how what he said is kinda triggering/sensitive.

Author: oldconcrete
Text: I would go off the edge over this in how way did he think that statement was okay. Don’t stand for that bs my boyfriend have never changed his reaction to me no matter my size (which has changed a fuck ton in our relationship). That’s bs babe fuck that
